name: Certain Death
description:
CERTAIN DEATH

         Jack Of Trades 

 Platform: Windows/PC

  •  SETTING:

Kroma(character) is now in dimension937 and trying to survive there against endless mind controlled demons.

  •  CHARACTERS:

      Kroma  from dimension24437 travel in different dimension to save the interdimensional flow  from some mind controlled creators. His task is to save himself  from those demons and maintaining the dimensional flow.

  •  RULES:

  GOAL

     Score high as much as player can by killing enemies with the help of the 

     shooter.

 

  CHALLENGE

      Saving the character from attacks and eliminating enemies.

  RULES

    1.   Player have to eliminate enemies by shooting them.

    2.    Player have limited health for survival.

    3. For refilling , player has to find the crate. After the crate has been used up , it will be randomly transported to another location and player has to find the crate again for further refilling.  

    4. Elimination of each enemy increases the score.

    5. Basic aim of the player is to score high as the game is endless.

    6. Enemies will respawn after a regular interval. The respawning time will decrease as the score increases.

    7. You will be given 200 bullets in the beginning (and this will be the no. of bullets after each refill). The bullets will be given in magazines of 50 and you have to reload once you use up the current magazine.

 Controls :

 Reload : R

Shooting : Space bar or Left click

Movement : arrow keys
